overview:
Mobile Technology & New Media Evangelist and Executive MBA with focus on Leading Innovation at Stockholm School of Economics.

His experience and skills allows him to capitalize on the convergence of the Internet and Telecommunications industries, through the breadth of experience he has gained in sale/marketing and business development, product/services development & partner alliances, since the inception of the mobile telecommunications industry in Europe he has worked with biggest online companies, mobile network operators, and handset manufacturers, such as European Directories, Vodafone, Orange, T-Mobile, Nokia and Sony Ericsson.
